title: Titans Pro 2.0 - NEW Amazon Niche & Keyword Research Tool with Est Search Volume & More

tactics.name: Keyword Expansion
tactics.description: Use Titans Pro to generate 15x more keywords than Amazon's standard search by typing a seed keyword and expanding via search suggestions.
steps: Install Chrome extension or use web app
caveats: Less results for highly niche keywords
source_quotes: 'we can see here that we have 151 search results'

tactics.name: cross-platform keyword research
tactics.description: Identify high-demand keywords across multiple platforms like Pinterest, Walmart, YouTube, and eBay using Titans Pro tool
steps: Use search bar to find trending keywords
Analyze search volume and demand metrics
Create optimized content for target platforms
source_quotes: This also works on eBay. And then if you're a freelancer, this also works for Fiverr.

heuristics.name: Score Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If opportunity score > 5 and demand score > 5, prioritize niche
source_quotes: 'ideally what we're looking for is at least one of them or even better both of them in the green'

heuristics.name: tool popularity heuristic
heuristics.condition: If tool has over 50,000 active users, prioritize it for keyword research
source_quotes: Currently we have 50,000 active authors using this.

claims.statement: Titans Pro contains millions of Amazon keywords collected over 5 years
source_quotes: 'Titans Pro has now been running for almost 5 years to date'

claims.statement: Titans Pro 2.0 is used by over 100,000 people across multiple platforms
source_quotes: This has been used by over 100,000 people

niche_patterns.description: Combine broad product categories with specific audience segments and use cases to identify low-competition niches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with lower competition for targeted audiences
source_quotes: 'the shorter the keyword and the broader it is, the more keywords you will see'

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (teen boys), problem (ADHD), and constraint (Christian) for precise niche targeting
source_quotes: If you're selling on Walmart, this works the same way.
